title: Fairly heavy showers expected in some places today
byline: The Department of Meteorology says that showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Southern province today (09).

title: Indonesia ready to shelter Palestinians impacted by war in Gaza
byline: Indonesia is ready to temporarily shelter Palestinians impacted by the war in Gaza, President Prabowo Subianto said in a statement on Wednesday, as he started his trip to the Middle East region and Turkey.

title: Stocks slide again as US forges ahead with 104% tariffs on China
byline: The United States said on Tuesday that 104% duties on imports from China will take effect shortly after midnight, even as the administration of President Donald Trump moved to quickly start talks with other trading partners targeted by sweeping tariffs.

title: Urban schools face severe A/L teacher shortage?
byline: The Ceylon Teachers’ Union (CTU) raised alarm over a critical shortage of teachers for the G.C.E. Advanced Level (A/L) in schools across the country, particularly in urban national schools.
